articles.title: Artificial Intelligence Integration in Healthcare Industry Is on a Clear Transformation Path: From Augmentation Tools for Human Workers to Semi-autonomous AI Agents, Overseen by Humans
articles.summary: When businesses first adopt generative and agentic AI, they typically begin with low-risk use cases. But in highly regulated industries like healthcare, even seemingly simple administrative tasks

articles.title: Vantage Data Centers plans $25 billion AI campus in Texas
articles.summary: Vantage Data Centers said on Tuesday it would spend more than $25 billion to build a 1,200-acre data center campus in Shackelford County, Texas, as surging demand for artificial intelligence infrastructure fuels mega-scale developments.
articles.translated_title: Vantage Data Centers plans $25 billion AI campus in Texas
articles.translated_summary: Vantage Data Centers said on Tuesday it would spend more than $25 billion to build a 1,200-acre data center campus in Shackelford County, Texas, as surging demand for artificial intelligence infrastructure fuels mega-scale developments.

articles.title: More people trust AI instead of friends for shopping opinions, expert says
articles.summary: As people in DC region finish up their back-to-school shopping ahead of the first day of class, many of them may be turning to artificial intelligence for opinions.
articles.translated_title: More people trust AI instead of friends for shopping opinions, expert says

articles.title: 5 Actors Join Luca Guadagnino's OpenAI Movie Artificial Cast
articles.summary: Luca Guadagnino's comedic workplace drama about OpenAI adds five more actors, likely in supporting roles, to its star-studded cast.

articles.title: Bowman Says ‘Change Is Coming’ to How Fed Views AI and Crypto
articles.summary: Banks and regulators must embrace the benefits of new technologies such as artificial intelligence and crypto or risk diminishing their role in the economy, said US Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman.
articles.translated_title: Bowman Says ‘Change Is Coming’ to How Fed Views AI and Crypto
articles.translated_summary: Banks and regulators must embrace the benefits of new technologies such as artificial intelligence and crypto or risk diminishing their role in the economy, said US Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman.

articles.title: China restricts AI across the country to prevent kids cheating, America could learn from it
articles.summary: China now turns off AI functions for the whole country during exam periods. The CCP knows that their youth is learning less when they use artificial intelligence. Meanwhile, American students are using AI as a crutch and missing out on valuable learning experiences as a result.
articles.translated_title: China restricts AI across the country to prevent kids cheating, America could learn from it
articles.translated_summary: China now turns off AI functions for the whole country during exam periods. The CCP knows that their youth is learning less when they use artificial intelligence. Meanwhile, American students are using AI as a crutch and missing out on valuable learning experiences as a result.

articles.title: Amazon shares lag behind in stock market obsessed with AI
articles.summary: In a stock market obsessed with artificial intelligence, Amazon.com Inc. is losing ground.
articles.translated_title: Amazon shares lag behind in stock market obsessed with AI
articles.translated_summary: In a stock market obsessed with artificial intelligence, Amazon.com Inc. is losing ground.

articles.title: Meta Restructures AI Group Again in Pursuit of Superintelligence
articles.summary: Meta Platforms Inc. is splitting its newly formed artificial intelligence group into four distinct teams and reassigning many of the company’s existing AI employees, an attempt to better capitalize on billions of dollars’ worth of recently acquired talent.
articles.translated_title: Meta Restructures AI Group Again in Pursuit of Superintelligence

articles.title: Zuckerberg Plans Another Overhaul of Meta’s A.I. Efforts
articles.summary: Meta is expected to announce a new restructuring of its artificial intelligence division amid internal tensions over the technology, people with knowledge of the plans said.
articles.translated_title: Zuckerberg Plans Another Overhaul of Meta’s A.I. Efforts

articles.title: Why Gaxos.AI (GXAI) Shares Are Soaring Tuesday
articles.summary: Gaxos.AI shares are skyrocketing Tuesday morning. The company announced the launch of its new artificial intelligence platform, Art-Gen.AI.
